mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO admin_tb (name, cell_phone, email, password, money, withdrawals, recharge, identity_cards, qq, wechat, bank_user_name, bank_name, bank_account, bank_address, status, create_date, last_login_date, parent_id, role_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{cellPhone}, #{email}, #{password}, #{money}, #{withdrawals}, #{recharge}, #{identityCards}, #{qq}, #{wechat}, #{bankUserName}, #{bankName}, #{bankAccount}, #{bankAddress}, #{status}, #{createDate}, #{lastLoginDate}, #{parentId}, #{roleId})
mapper.update: UPDATE admin_tb SET name=#{name}, cell_phone=#{cellPhone}, email=#{email}, password=#{password}, money=#{money}, withdrawals=#{withdrawals}, recharge=#{recharge}, identity_cards=#{identityCards}, qq=#{qq}, wechat=#{wechat}, bank_user_name=#{bankUserName}, bank_name=#{bankName}, bank_account=#{bankAccount}, bank_address=#{bankAddress}, status=#{status}, create_date=#{createDate}, last_login_date=#{lastLoginDate}, parent_id=#{parentId}, role_id=#{roleId} WHERE admin_id=#{adminId}
mapper.select: SELECT admin_id, name, cell_phone, email, password, money, withdrawals, recharge, identity_cards, qq, wechat, bank_user_name, bank_name, bank_account, bank_address, status, create_date, last_login_date, parent_id, role_id FROM admin_tb WHERE admin_id=#{adminId}

SELECT admin_id, name, cell_phone, email, password, money, withdrawals, recharge, identity_cards, qq, wechat, bank_user_name, bank_name, bank_account, bank_address, status, create_date, last_login_date, parent_id, role_id FROM admin_tb WHERE (cell_phone=#{adminName} OR email=#{adminName}) AND password=#{password}

SELECT admin_id, name, cell_phone, email, password, money, withdrawals, recharge, identity_cards, qq, wechat, bank_user_name, bank_name, bank_account, bank_address, status, create_date, last_login_date, parent_id, role_id FROM admin_tb ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT admin_id, name, cell_phone, email, password, money, withdrawals, recharge, identity_cards, qq, wechat, bank_user_name, bank_name, bank_account, bank_address, status, create_date, last_login_date, parent_id, role_id FROM admin_tb WHERE role_id=#{roleId} ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT admin_id, name, cell_phone, email, password, money, withdrawals, recharge, identity_cards, qq, wechat, bank_user_name, bank_name, bank_account, bank_address, status, create_date, last_login_date, parent_id, role_id FROM admin_tb ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay}
SELECT count(admin_id) FROM admin_tb WHERE role_id=#{roleId}
